reviews.review_msg: oh gosh, Rob is amazing. taking IS with him last semester was probably one of the best decisions i have made during my time at SFU. very respectable, incredibly knowledgeable and talented, witty and easy to talk to. he is so encouraging and accomodating - we once met at another school completely just to go over my final paper! Rob is god!

Robert has a lot of experience in the field he teaches, not only academically but professionally. His lectures are very straight-forward and also very thought provoking. He is considerate and eager to help. Do your work and you will see the rewards.

He is so knowledgeable along great experiences. I always loved listening to his stories and  his passion for International Studies. It was a pleasure and would definitely try to take his course again in the near future.

I love Rob. Such a sweet guy with so much depth and a huge passion for the subject matter. He really takes the time to go through things, albeit quickly, but makes sure that everyone is clear before he moves on. He is engaging, open and approachable. You will not regret a class with Rob! Wish I can take more classes with him. He's also so cute lol

Amazing prof! He is so passionate about what he does which makes the whole course that much more interesting.  He's super down to earth, nice, and funny. Also he's super humble which is so rare among profs,  i would definitely chose to take another course with him.
Super nice, friendly guy. I went into political science expecting to fail, and was pleasantly surprised with my final grade! There is a lot of difficult content, though.

Wow, what an awesome prof. He makes the material very interesting and very relevant. He once replied to my email in 2 minutes. I love him because he doesn't take himself so seriously, rather he is a wonderful and caring person.
- FRIENDLIEST personality ever!!! so encouraging and motivating , i would def take more classes with him! so adorable !

Oh man, this guy is awesome. Wonderful teacher, wonderful guy. Very interesting, and very funny. He is insanely down to earth, and the material is enjoyable, due to him involving the class. Fair and easy marker. Definitely recommended!

A god among Professors, a beam of light in this drab, dreary world of Academic Professors. The man is humble, kind, knowledgable and patient. WHAT MORE DO YOU GUYS NEED? TAKE ANY CLASS WITH THE NAME R. HANLON NEXT TO IT!

Extremely easy grader! Shows strong interest in his field and in the class. Very kind, takes an interest in his students. Very sweet. It's rare to find a prof that is both kind and can teach effectively. Wish I could take another class with him!
He is really helpful but sometimes not clear when it comes to talking about essays and things of that nature. That being said he is very nice and a very good teacher.

Rob is awesome! Very well organized, extremely helpful, helps that he's not just a stuffy academic but has actually worked in the field. The best part was that he included various types of media, including some very relevant guest speakers - if only all profs put this much effort into teaching!
Rob was an awesome teacher, very organized and worked hard to make the lectures engaging.  Fair marker, I would happily take another class with him.

Rob is the sweetest person you will ever meet. The material is a little boring, but he does his best to make it more interesting. He is very fair with his marking and in general, an awesome teacher!!!

Rob is the sweetest person you will ever meet. He is young and connects to every student at a personal level. The material is a little bit dry, but he does his best to make it more interesting. He is very fair with his marking and in general, an awesome teacher!!!
Was really looking forward to taking Human Security but the class was not what I had hoped for.  Very theoretical and dry.  Nice enough guy though!  He's young, I'm sure he will improve over time.
